text.text_translated: If we understand that people can have different expectations and behaviour, it can help us avoid communication problems. However, it is also very important to remember that using stereotypes can be harmful to building good business relationships. Stereotypes are simple but often untrue ideas about what a group of people is like. Our national culture can influence how we behave and think. However, many other things also influence us. These include the region we come from, our communities, our age and gender, our company's culture, and our personal experiences. For this reason, we should keep these possible differences in mind, but not use them to judge everyone from a country in the same way.
